27710.「はぁはぁ……。やっと 追いついた。\n こんなに 遠かったなんて……。:
Huff, huff... I finally caught up.
I didn't really how farther it was...

27711.「ねえ どこなの……。\n フィーヤが 身を投げた場所は どこ……？: Is this... Where Fiya threw herself off...?

27713.「ここで 何か 感じる！\n こないだの洞くつのときと 同じだわ！！:
I sense something near! It's the same as
the other day in the cave!

27714.「フィーヤ！ ここに いるの！？\n いるなら 姿を見せなさい！！: Fiya!! Are you here? Show yourself if you are!

27717.「だったら 答えなさい！\n なんで 私を殺そうとしているの！？:
Then answer me!
Why are you trying to kill me?

27718.「……なんなの？\n ふざけないで ちゃんと答えて！:
... What is it? Stop messing around,
and give me a proper answer!

27719.「……もしかして しゃべれないの？: ... Could it be that, you can't speak?

27720.「……そうか。薬を飲まされて\n しゃべれなくされたんだったわね。\n 幽霊にな:
... I see. As we were told, they gave you a
Cursed Mixture that sealed your voice. Even
as a ghost that curse remained...

27721.「でも 何も 聞けなかったら\n ここまで来た 意味がないよ。\n どうすれば:
But if i can't ask anything, coming all
the way here will feel meaningless.
What should i do...?

27722.「そうだ！ 私に のりうつることは できる？\n 私の身体を使って 話せばいいの:
I've got it! Can you possess my body? I mean,
use my body to communicate through me.

27723.「……怖くない 怖くない。\n 死ぬことに比べたら ぜんぜん 平気……。:
... I'm not afraid, i'm not afraid.
This is nothing compared to dying.

27724.「ああ……なにこれ。とても 変な感じ……。: Oh...what is this? It feels so strange...

27725.「自分の中に フィーヤがいるのが わかる……。: I can feel Fiya's soul in me...

27726.「来て…くれて ありが…とう……。\n 私は……フィーヤ。:
Thank... you... for coming...
here... I am... Fiya.

27727.「ルベカ……気を……つけて。\n 命の輝きが……闇に…呑まれる……。:
Rubecca... be careful. Your spark of like...
will dim away... engulfed by darkness...

27728.「よかった。しゃべれるみたいね。: I'm glad. It seems that you can speak.

27729.「でも 気をつけてって どういうこと？\n その死の言葉で あなたが\n 私を:
But what do you mean by being careful?
Aren't you the one trying to kill me
by using the speech of death?

27730.「……ちがう。私は…殺そうとなんて…してない。\n わかるだけ……死ぬ人が…わか:
... No, you are wrong... I'm not trying to
kill... you. I just know... who are... the
next targets... that will die.

27731.「死ぬ人……命の輝き……なくなって…いく。\n 私……教えた…かった。:
People that will die... have a fading spark
of life... I... I wanted to tell... you.

27732.「えっ……。フィーヤは その人に\n 死ぬことを 伝えたかっただけなの？:
I get it... So Fiya just wanted to tell
that person that he was going to die?

27733.「でも フィーヤは 海に入ったダーリアさんを\n 追いかけて 殺したって……。:
But Fiya chased after Miss Dahlia
and drowner her in the sea...

27734.「危険……感じた。ダーリア姉ちゃん……。\n 見ているだけは もう いや…だった:
Danger... I felt it. Dahlia... I couldn't
just keep watching. That's why...
I went to the sea..

27735.「じゃあ フィーヤは ダーリアさんを\n 助けようとして 海に……。:
So, Fiya tried to save Ms. Dahlia by going
into the sea with her...

27736.「……ダーリアさんを殺したのは\n フィーヤじゃなかった。それが 真実なんだね。:
... The truth is that Fiya didn't 
kill Ms. Dahlia, right?

27737.「でも……。それじゃ 私は\n どうして 死ぬことになるの？:
But... If that's the case, why am i
the one who's going to die?

27738.「私……見え…た。黒い影……恨み…怒り……。:
I... saw it... a black shadow... full
of resentment... and anger...

27739.「ここから北の方に…たくさんの木……。\n 大きな穴……。その中に……。:
To the north from here... a lot of trees...
inside a large hole... is waiting there...

27740.「穴の中に 私が死ぬ原因になる\n 何かが あるっていうのね？:
In that hole, there's something that could be
the cause of my death, you sure that's true?

27741.「……奥に…黒い影……見える。\n 何か……わからない……。:
...Deep inside... a black shadow...
that's all... i can see...

27742.「確かめにいくしかないようね。\n 原因が なんだろうと それを取り除けば\n:
I guess we'll just have to check there.
Whatever is causing this, removing it
may save me from dying!

27743.「ねえ <pc>。\n フィーヤが教えてくれた場所が どこなのか \n 探してみ:
Hey <pc>. Could you try to find 
the place Fiya told us about?

27744.「私も フィーヤと 追いかけるから。\n よろしく 頼んだわよ！:
Me and Fiya will follow you after.
We're counting on you!!

27745.「ここが フィーヤの言ってた場所なの？: Is this the place Fiya was talking about?

27746.「でも なんにも なさそうだけど……。:
But it doesn't look like there's
anything here...

27750.「オオオォォォ。この匂い……。\n この匂いは あの戦士の 血の匂いか……！？:
Grrrawl... This smell... Could it be the
scent of that Warrior's blood...!?

27752.「わざわざ お前のほうから 出向いてくるとは。\n 殺しにいく手間が 省けたとい:
You've come all the way here just to meet me.
It saves me the trouble of going to kill you.

27753.「えっ！？ 私に 言ってるの？: Huh!? Are you talking to me?

27754.「私を殺すつもりってこと？\n いったい 何が目的なの！？:
Are you planning to kill me? What is
your purpose with this?

27755.「グフゥゥゥ……。我が名は 波怨竜。\n かつて この島に君臨していた。:
Grr... I am Wavragon. I once was
the ruler on this island.

27756.「だが ウェディ族の戦士に敗れ\n このような みじめな姿に 成り果てた……。:
But I was defeated by a Weddie Warrior and
got reduced to this miserable state...

27757.「お前は その憎き戦士の血を引く娘。\n その血の匂いを 忘れるわけがない！\n:
You are the daughter who carries the blood of
that detestable warrior. I'll never forget the
scent of that blood! My revenge won't fail!

27758.「私……見た。\n この魔物が……ダーリア姉ちゃんを……\n 海に…引きずり…こ:
I...saw. This monster... dragged...
Miss Dahlia... into... the sea!

27760.「そうか。\n あの娘は ダーリアという名だったか。: I see. That girl was named Dahlia, wasn't she?

27761.「名など知らなかったが 憎き戦士の血を引く \n ウェディの女を 海に沈めてやっ:
I didn't know her name, but she was a Female Weddie who carried that hateful warrior's blood. I sank her into the sea, just before she was
about to be united with the man she loved.

27763.「男の魂は 女を求めて 永遠に さまよい\n 女は 二度と 男と出会うことはない:
That man's soul will wander forever seeking
that woman, but she will never met him again.
My disappointment should have been averted!

27764.「だというのに その女は 男を見つけだし\n 天へ 昇っていきおったのだ！\n:
And yet, that woman found a man and ascended
to the heavens together! Grrah- What a regret!

27765.「だが こうして 憎き戦士の血を引く者を\n ふたたび 見つけた！ お前を殺して:
But now, I have found someone who carries the
blood of that detested warrior again! By
killing you, I will finally get my revenge!

27766.「憎き戦士の血…………？: The blood of a hated warrior...?

27768.「結婚式のリストに 私の おばあちゃんの\n 名前があったわ。ダーリアさんの親族:
My grandma's name was on the wedding list.
She said she was a relative of Dahlia's.

27769.「つまり 私は ダーリアさんと\n 血が つながってるってことなんだ……。:
In other words, this means that i am related
to Miss Dahlia by blood...

27770.「この魔物に ダーリアさんは 殺された。\n レグさんが死んだのも フィーヤが死:
This monster killed Miss Dahlia. And then
Mr. Reg's and Fiya's death were all because
of this evil creature...

27771.「フィーヤが 警告してくれなかったら\n 私も こいつに 殺されるところだったん:
If Fiya hadn't warned me, he would 
have killed me too!

27773.「ねえ <cs_pchero>。\n こいつを ギタギタに やっつけちゃって！:
<cs_pchero>, show no mercy.
Beat this thing to a pulp!

27774.「グフフフゥ。我を倒すだと？\n そんなことが できると思っているのか。:
Grrrah-haha. You think you can defeat me?
Do you truly believe such a thing?

27775.「我が無念を晴らすまで この怒りは 治まらぬ。\n お前の身をもって 知るがいい:
"My anger will not subside until I avenge my
grievances. I'll make you learn it too!"

27777.「こいつを ほっといたら いずれ\n 私を狙って レーンの村に やってくるよ。\:
If we leave this creature alone, it will
eventually come after me to Lane Village.
Defeat it before letting that happen!

27778.「匂う……。あの戦士の血の匂いだ。\n どこだ……どこにいる……。\n 我が無念:
I can smell it... the scent of that warrior's
blood. Where... where are you...? I won't let
my grievances go unanswered!

27779.「見つけた……。見つけたぞ。\n おとなしく ここで 死ぬがいい！！: I found you... I found you! Just obey and die!

27780.「ウォォォォォォォン！！\n 身体が……身体が 崩れる……！: Grrrw-rgh! My body... my body is crumbling...!

27781.「おのれ おのれ！\n 我が無念を 晴らすまでは……。\n オオオォォン……！！:
You... you! I won't perish till
get my revenge... Grrr-...guh!

27782.「やった……。やっつけたわ！！: We did it... we defeated it!

27783.「<cs_pchero> おつかれさま。 \n あなたの おかげだわ。\n それ:
<cs_pchero>, you went all out!
I couldn't have done it without you. But
also... thanks for everything Fiya...

27784.「ルベカ…命の輝き……明るく…なった。:
Rubecca... your spark of life...
has started to shine again.

27785.「じゃあ 私が 死ぬ危険は なくなったのね？\n よかった……。私 死ななくてい:
So I'm no longer in danger of dying? That's
a relief... I don't have to die!

27786.「ダーリア姉ちゃん……助けられな…かった。\n でも……ルベカ…助けられ…た。:
Miss Dahlia, I couldn't save you... but at
least, I was able... to save Miss... Rubecca.

27787.「はじめて…助けられ…た。うれ…しい……。\n 死ぬ人…わかるのに……助けられな:
For the first time...someone saved me. I'm so happy... even though i can perceive those... who are dying... not being able to save them
... was so painful.

27788.「……ごめんなさい フィーヤ。\n あなたのことを ダーリアさんを殺した\n 犯:
...I'm sorry, Fiya. For thinking all this time
that you were the culprit who killed Dahlia.

27789.「でも 真実は そうじゃなかった。\n フィーヤは みんなを助けようとしていたの:
But the truth was the opposite. Fiya tried
to save everyone, but no one realized it.

27790.「もう 遅いけど……。ありがとう フィーヤ。: It's too late now... but thank you, Fiya.

27791.「……最後の…お願い……聞いて。: ... My final request ... Can you listen it?

27792.「なんでも言って。私に できることなら\n どんなことでも してあげるよ。:
Tell me anything. If there's anything I
can do, I'll do it for you.

27793.「レグ兄ちゃんと…ダーリア姉ちゃんの…所へ\n 私も……行き…たい……。:
I want to... go to... Reg and...
Miss Dahlia's... place... too.

27794.「うん。わかったよ。連れていってあげる。: Gotcha! I understand. I'll take you there.

27795.「さて <cs_pchero>？ 今 フィーヤが言ってた\n レグさんと ダーリ:
Well, <cs_pchero>? Fiya mentioned
it earlier, but you obviously know where
Reg and Dahlia's place is, right?

27796.「最後の推理は <cs_pchero>に させてあげる。\n 場所がわかったら:
I'll let <cs_pchero> make the final
deduction. Once you know the location, will
you head there? I won't give you clues!

27797.「この真実 いただきます！: Now YOU must reach the one and only truth!

27798.<pipipi_low>「来てくれたね <pc>くん。\n そう。ここが レグさ:
<pipipi_low>Thanks for coming <pc>.
That's right, this is the place where
Mr. Reg and Ms. Dahlia rest.

27799.「フィーヤ。見える？ この慰霊碑は\n レグさんと ダーリアさんのために\n 建:
Fiya. Do you see it? This cenotaph was built
for Mr. Reg and Ms. Dahlia.

27800.「レグさんと ダーリアさんは\n ずっと 離ればなれに なってたんだ。: Reg and Dahlia were separated for a long time.

27801.「でも 今は 一緒に いるはずだよ。: But I'm sure they're together now.

27802.「……見える。\n レグ兄ちゃんと…ダーリア姉ちゃん。: ... I can see them. Mr. Reg and... Ms. Dahlia.

27803.「ふたりも こっちを…見てくれてた。\n 私……行かなくちゃ。: They were looking at us too. I... have to go.

27804.「フィーヤのこと 絶対に忘れないよ。\n あなたが 私たちに してくれたことも\:
I will never forget you Fiya. I won't forget
what you did for us, or what the people in
the village did to you.

27805.「あなたのこと 全部 忘れないから！: I won't forget anything about you!

27806.<if_woman>「ありがとう……ルベカ…姉ちゃん。\n ありがとう…<pc>:
Thanks... Rubecca, you were like a sister
to me... And thank you too <pc>!
The strongest <if_woman>Sister
<else>Brother<endif> ever!

27810.「以上でダーリア事件の真相は 解明されたわ。\n 真犯人も裁かれたし カンペキに:
Aaand that's the truth of Dahlia's incident.
The real culprit was brought to justice, this
case is now considered closed!

27811.「これで 私が結婚することになっても\n 村に 何か 起こったりしないはずだわ。:
With this, even if I get married, nothing
should happen to the village. I should start
looking for my other half right away!

27812.「忙しくなるから 少女探偵ルベカちゃんは\n しばらく お休みにしようと思うの。:
It's going to get busy, so I should take a
break as Girl Detective Rubecca for a while.

27813.「今まで ありがとう <pc>くん。\n あなたの おかげで 少女探偵ルベカちゃ:
Thank you for everything <pc>. 
Thanks to you, Girl Detective Rubecca was
able to solve numerous challenges!

27814.「これ 今までの お礼だよ。\n がんばって 用意したから 受け取って！:
This is my gratitude for all of your hard work
up until now. I prepared it with all my
effort, so please accept it!

27815.「フィーヤは ふたりに会えるかな……？: I wonder if Fiya can meet them...?

27816.「ううん。絶対に会える。: No. She will definitely be able to.

27817.「だって 私の推理によれば\n これから ３人は ずーっと 一緒に\n 仲良く暮:
According to my theory, the three of them will
be together and rest in harmony from now on!
Do you know why?

27818.「この真実 いただきました！！: Because that's the one and only truth!
